name: Modern Post
description:
A Ludum Dare 51 project. Loading might take some time. Remember to click on the game screen to start the game.

Take a new challenge, being a worker on the most modern and innovative postal office.

Here, all packages have artificial intelligence, so they can ship themseves on their own.

For some reason, they require workers to put them in a certain pattern, or else they will explode after 10 seconds.

Do your job, trying to satisfy this strange AI!
